thread.title: Buy Boeing shares despite fears of tariffs, says Sylvia Jablonsky

title: Buy Boeing shares despite fears of tariffs, says Sylvia Jablonsky
text:
Buy Boeing shares despite fears of tariffs, says Sylvia Jablonsky 1:50am IST - 06:39 
Direxion's institutional ETF strategist tells Reuters' Fred Katayama why she's bullish on Boeing and what institutional investors are doing to hedge amid the volatility. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
